body.p: Chicago, Illinois, soldier, attorney, and politician. Henry County, Kentucky native. Married to Charlotte Leonard Thomasson. Father of Charles L. Thomasson, Sarah Thomasson, Mary P. Thomasson, Anne C. Thomasson, Nelson Thomasson, John J. Thomasson. Represented Harrison County, Indiana, in the State Legislature from 1818 to 1820. City Attorney in Louisville, Kentucky. County Attorney in Jefferson County. Member of the Whig Party for the State of Kentucky in the United States House of Representatives from 1843 to 1847. Attorney in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Chicago, Illinois, in 1860.
